meanings.definition: A very tall building with many stories
meanings.sent1: The skyscrapers in the city create a stunning skyline.
meanings.sent2: People work in the skyscrapers downtown.
meanings.sent3: The little bird thought the skyscrapers were giant trees.
meanings.sent4: The skyscrapers stood like giants against the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight reflected off the glass windows of the skyscrapers, making them sparkle.

meanings.definition: A building that is significantly taller than the surrounding buildings
meanings.sent1: The skyscrapers towered over the smaller houses nearby.
meanings.sent2: The new skyscraper was the tallest in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb the skyscraper, thinking it was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper loomed over the town like a giant watching over its subjects.
meanings.sent5: The lights in the skyscraper at night made it look like a beacon in the dark.

meanings.definition: A structure that reaches a great height in the sky
meanings.sent1: The hot air balloon floated near the skyscrapers, giving a sense of their immense height.
meanings.sent2: The skyscrapers seemed to touch the clouds on that clear day.
meanings.sent3: The kite got stuck on top of one of the skyscrapers, much to the amusement of the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The skyscrapers reached for the sky like giants trying to touch the heavens.
meanings.sent5: The view from the top of the skyscraper was breathtaking, with the whole city spread out below.
